name: The Dark Planet
description:
In the far reaches of space a world without a sun is being consumed by evil. Smokefang has been unleashed and is determined to destroy the crystal core that gives all life to The Dark Planet (Gluonia). The last remaining ancients have summoned you, the last hope to put an end to Smokefangs evil plans. 

 With the power of light, and the ability to change shape navigate your way on an epic journey through a sunless planet of vast landscapes blooming with bioluminescent flora and fauna. Take the form of fire, ice and stone, perform powerful moves and unlock the path ahead. Meet the native species that inhabit the grassy valleys, swamps, deep forests, snowy mountains, volcanic caves and the landlocked ocean.

• Original detailed 3d environments and music. • Main story and side quests. • Collect a wide range of items. • Morph into a sphere to roll, bounce and perform burst attacks. • Level up your characters health and dark energy supply. • Battle a wide range of monsters and three dark beasts. • Discover the location of the Ancient temple of light. • Defeat Smokefang
